      • coalesceEntity_InsertOrUpdate

        public boolean coalesceEntity_InsertOrUpdate(String ivarobjectkey,
                                             String ivarname,
                                             String ivarsource,
                                             String ivarversion,
                                             String ivarentityid,
                                             String ivarentityidtype,
                                             String ivarentityxml,
                                             org.joda.time.DateTime ivardatecreated,
                                             org.joda.time.DateTime ivarlastmodified)
                                      throws SQLException
        Note: Derby stored procedures cannot handle long XML types. So, we will NOT use stored procedures in the derby persistor for the base tables. I will keep this here temporarily as an example for template registration creation of stored procedures.
        Parameters:

        ivarname -
